description: Advanced sentiment analysis template based on nws77 dataset experience with variable placeholders

nws77.description: EUR region TOP2500 universe, DataSet ID: nws77. DataFields Type: Vector

dataprocess_op.description: Data processing functions like quantile(x), winsorize(x) for data normalization

ts_Statistical_op.description: Time series statistical functions like ts_ir(x,days), ts_zscore(x,days), ts_entropy(x,days)

search_space_size: 29*2*3=174 combinations (29 data fields * 2 dataprocess ops * 3 ts_statistical ops)

data_characteristics.distribution: Highly concentrated and negatively skewed distribution, with a prominent mode around -0.18
data_characteristics.sparsity: Extremely sparse with high prevalence of NaN values
data_characteristics.coverage: Strong upward trend since 2013 with clear quarterly seasonality
data_characteristics.time_series_nature: Event-driven, not continuous time series, corresponds to discrete events like earnings calls
data_characteristics.group_behavior: Group-level averages show strong co-movement, suggesting common macro influence

implementation_details.signal_processing: vec_max selects maximum element from vector, group_backfill fills missing values to reduce unexpected position closures
implementation_details.data_adjustment: dataprocess_op adjusts data distribution and reduces extreme values to enhance signal
implementation_details.time_series_extraction: ts_Statistical_op extracts temporal information from preprocessed data
implementation_details.signal_smoothing: ts_decay_linear further smooths and enhances the signal

performance_notes.turnover: Generally high turnover (not extreme values but consistently high over time)
performance_notes.success_rate: 1 out of 174 backtests produced a submittable single data field Alpha
performance_notes.signal_quality: Remaining alphas show clear signals, proving template versatility on nws77 dataset
